name: Default Style v1
description: Clean, minimalist pictograms with high contrast and simple shapes. Optimized for clarity and recognizability in AAC contexts.
prompt_template: Create a simple, clear pictogram representing: '{phrase_spanish}' (English: '{phrase_english}'). Use minimalist flat design with high contrast. Focus on immediate recognizability. The pictogram should be culturally appropriate for Spanish-speaking contexts and suitable for augmentative and alternative communication (AAC). Output as clean SVG.

prompt_parameters.negative_prompt: complex details, gradients, shadows, 3D effects, text, labels, photorealistic

notes: This is the baseline style profile for VCSCI evaluation. All variants should be compared against this default.
